name: Make a beat (Lo-fi hip hop)
description: Create a Lo-fi hip hop beat with characteristic laid-back patterns and dusty vintage samples
hints: Lo-fi hip hop beats are typically around 85 BPM with a laid-back feel
Key characteristics: dusty, vintage samples with analog warmth
Start with a basic kick-snare pattern, then add subtle hi-hat variations
Use the pads panel to record your beat or draw in the piano roll
Add slight swing and humanization for that organic groove
The vinyl effects will give your beat that classic lo-fi character

validationSteps.description: Create a clip with at least 4 drum events
Set tempo close to recommended 85 BPM
Play the beat and verify timing
Add variation with at least 2 different drum sounds
